description: The Mad Flower at the End of the Road
requirements: When the Electro Regisvine emits a beam of thunderous light, paralyze it by attacking its corolla.
Defeat an exhausted Jadeplume Terrorshroom after its activation state is finished.

description: The Smell of Grilled Mushrooms in the Morning
requirements: In a single challenge, defeat 6 Fungi produced by Jadeplume Terrorshroom in a Burning state.
In a single challenge, bring the Aeonblight Drake down by attacking the cores on its wings.
In a single challenge, interrupt the energy flow of the Aeonblight Drake by attacking the core on its head.
Defeat an Aeonblight Drake that has increased resistance to at least two different elements.
Defeat the Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network in its overclocked, Overloaded state.
primo: Defeat the boss while it is paralyzed after completing its overclocking attack.

requirements: Break the Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network by hitting its cores with the Quicken, Aggravate, or Spread reactions.
